The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Skeleton (Melzar's Maze)
For other uses, see Skeleton (disambiguation).
 This article has a Slayer task guide here.
Information comparing locations for Slayer tasks will be on this page

Five skeletons can be found on the 2nd floor[UK]3rd floor[US] of Melzar's Maze. They must be killed in order to obtain the yellow key, which can unlock the yellow doors and progress through the maze.

The yellow key is always dropped by the skeleton holding a round shield, and will never be dropped by the other skeletons.

Contents

  • 1 Locations
  • 2 Drops
  • 3 Changes
    • 3.1 Gallery (historical)

Drops[edit | edit source]

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Bones1Always770
Key (yellow)1AlwaysNot soldN/A
Note: The yellow key is a 100% drop from the skeleton with a round shield, and a 0% drop for the rest.
